description:
Pay beverages with RFID-Tag
You and your colleagues have a cash register for beverages in office or club ? 
Tired of paying with coins ? Why don't use cheap RFID-Tags

All you need is a cheap tablet that can do USB-OTG, a card-reader and some tokens

Looks good on tablets bigger or equal 7" 
(Sorry didn't optimize it for smaller screens, when I wrote it long time ago)

The first token you read in will become the Matmin-Token, that can change the price
and shows the status of the cash register
